name: Eats your soul, you have no control (Buzdi, Kayakaga)
name_original: Eats your soul, you have no control (Buzdi, Kayakaga)
description:
You enter the mind of a psychedelic man, who has to run away from a ghost that's chasing him. The ghost will chase you wherever you go and make you uncontrollable when he reaches you. When that happens you will also gain control of the interactable objects on the screen. The voices in your head will make you commit suicide when you lose control and you'll have to protect yourself using everything you can.

Programmers: Kayakaga, Buzdi

Art: Belkata, GrimGlory

Music and Sound effects: Belkata
